Summary: andriod human machine scout robot man
divs: Sighting Detailsearly one morning I was awoken by strange foot steps coming from my drive way to my bedroom window. I then discoverd an eight foot tall sliver robot like man trying to greet me. I was actually on four on the bed I was awoken from at 5a.m. for years I've seen or heard of some type of alien life forms contacting us. we live near mcx campendleton, I also dicoverd an article on marpat camoflage gear ,fcs I some what study astronomy.
